pkgmetadata.longdescription: Network Based Statistics in R for Mixed Effects Models // An implementation of network-based statistics in R for mixed effects models. Theoretical background for Network Based Statistics can be found in Zalesky et al. (2010) doi:10.1016/j.neuroimage.2010.06.041. For Mixed Effects Models check the R package https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=nlme.
